text: @NYGovCuomo So P.L.E.A.S.E. check first this new study „Vitamin D deficiency and co-morbidities in #COVID19 patients – A fatal relationship?“ here: https://t.co/JqKBU0CSvK.                          And then check your VitaminD status!!! IMPORTANT AND LIVE SAVING
